instructions.da: Fortsæt svagt til højre mod Destination 1
instructions.es: Continúa levemente a la derecha hacia Destination 1
instructions.es-ES: Continúa ligeramente a la derecha hacia Destination 1
instructions.fr: Continuer légèrement à droite en direction de Destination 1
instructions.hu: Hajtson tovább enyhén jobbra a Destination 1 irányába
instructions.id: Lanjutkan agak ke kanan menuju Destination 1
instructions.it: Continua a destra leggermente verso Destination 1
instructions.ja: Destination 1へ向けて斜め右に進む
instructions.my: Destination 1ဆီသို့ ညာဘက် အနည်းငယ်ကို ဆက်သွားပါ
instructions.nl: Ga iets naar rechts richting Destination 1
instructions.no: Fortsett litt til høyre mot Destination 1
instructions.pl: Kontynuuj łagodnie w prawo w kierunku Destination 1
instructions.pt-BR: Continue suave à direita sentido Destination 1
instructions.pt-PT: Continue ligeiramente à direita em direção a Destination 1
instructions.sl: Nadaljujte rahlo desno v smeri proti Destination 1
instructions.tr: Destination 1 istikametinde hafif sağ yönde devam et
instructions.uk: Рухайтесь плавно праворуч у напрямку Destination 1
instructions.vi: Chạy tiếp bên phải nghiêng về Destination 1
instructions.yo: Tesiwaju diẹ ọtun si ọna Destination 1
